summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image shows a gameplay scene set in a snowy forest environment. A character, dressed in ornate armor, is engaged in combat with a large, muscular enemy. The character is performing an acrobatic move with a glowing staff. The enemy has a visible health bar above its head. The UI includes various icons on the bottom left and right corners, indicating abilities or items, and a health and stamina bar at the bottom center. The snowy landscape is detailed with trees and bushes, adding to the immersive environment.
